questions.text: A patient was admitted in ICU with dilated pupil which were sluggishly reacting to light, dry skin with pulse of 120 – 140 / min and temperature of 1030F. He was unable to pass urine and had muttering delirium. What is the treatment of choice in this case?

options.label: B
options.text: Both A and R are true. R is not correct explanation for A

options.label: C

questions.correct_answer: B. Both A and R are true. R is not correct explanation for A
